title: jrrsparkles
author: jrrsparkles
content: I always wanted to ask you about the existence of APPLE devices, especially smartphones and mac. Because their only strategy is to convince them that they device is safe and secure which is not 100% true and their insane pricing for the gadgets released is getting outrageous.So do you think they will survive forever or will go down in the next 10 years if they don't make any changes?

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Quote from: jrrsparkles on December 02, 2023, 08:31:41 AMI always wanted to ask you about the existence of APPLE devices, especially smartphones and mac. Because their only strategy is to convince them that they device is safe and secure which is not 100% true and their insane pricing for the gadgets released is getting outrageous.From this, you're able to understand why branding is important for a product. And by the time when Steve Jobs was still there and explains the feeling of owning one capturing the moments that you will have to remember a life time is what sold to the people.Until it's been developed and the luxury feeling that a consumer needs it has been built. They just managed to maintain that and good thing they're successful on it.Quote from: jrrsparkles on December 02, 2023, 08:31:41 AMSo do you think they will survive forever or will go down in the next 10 years if they don't make any changes?No one knows, really.

comments.author: btc78
comments.body: at this point, what apple is selling is not the product itself but rather their brand we are paying this much because apple is already an established brandits prices and its “upgrades” are no longer aligned but with apple serving as a statement of economic or social status, i have no doubt that it can continue to thrive especially with teenagers to young adults as their target audience
